updateLog: üöÄ Added enhanced HTTP logger with support for Graylog/GELF, Datadog, and Loki
üóëÔ∏è Removed redundant syslog.lua in favor of unified HTTP logger
‚ö° Enhanced version checker with retry logic and 24-hour caching
üîß Improved error handling throughout all logger modules
üé® Enhanced console output with color-coded messages and emojis
üõ°Ô∏è Added robust convar validation and system-specific checks
üìù Updated documentation with comprehensive HTTP logger examples
üö® Added export function for manual version checks
breakingChanges: Config.SysLogEnabled has been replaced with Config.HTTPEnabled
LOGHOST convar replaced with WEBPOINT + LOG_SYSTEM convars
syslog.lua file removed - use http.lua with LOG_SYSTEM='graylog'
newFeatures: Multi-system HTTP logger (Graylog, Datadog, Loki, Generic)
Advanced retry logic with exponential backoff
Enhanced error messages with specific troubleshooting
bugFixes: Fixed version checker pointing to wrong GitHub repository
Resolved circular dependency issues in HTTP logger
Fixed buffer timeout configuration not being respected

instructions: 1. Update Config.SysLogEnabled to Config.HTTPEnabled in server/config.lua
2. Replace 'set LOGHOST' with 'set WEBPOINT' and 'set LOG_SYSTEM graylog' in server.cfg
3. Remove any manual syslog.lua references from custom code
4. Test HTTP logger with 'll:test http' command
5. Verify smart routing still works with new gelf destination

security.notes: This release includes security improvements in HTTP request handling and convar validation.

improvements: Reduced HTTP requests through intelligent caching
Optimized buffer management in HTTP logger
Improved memory usage in version checker

commands: ll:test http - Test enhanced HTTP logger
